overview:
Leather Lovely is a brand of Maranata Co. and created by two leather engineers who are Bilgin ÃœzÃ¼m and Nuray Olcay IÅŸÄ±k, Msc. They are manufacturing genuine leather with using latest leather technological systems with our team for exclusive leather products.

Our fashion designers from Campo de Fiori Italy designing models according to trends. We make unique fashion designed leather products using first class leather.

Leatherlovely.com is online outlet of our products. We sell retail and wholesale our fashion designed genuine leather products directly from our company to all over the world.

Our engineers are testing light fastness, air permeability, strong strenght, rubbing fastness, color fastness of all products in our phsical test laboratory. They are using Taber test equipment, Xenon test equipment, UV spectrophotometer, Shimadzu, rubbing test equipment and other equipments for physical tests.

They determine chemical analysis of leather samples such as chromium (VI) content in leather, content of chromium oxide, content of sulphated ash etc. in our chemical laboratory. We can send reports for all our products.

We guarantee for all our products for workmen ship and leather quality at extremely competitive price with timely delivery.

Our products can also be had with buyer’ s own logos or symbols in single or multiple colors fine printings or with embroidery work.

Thank you for your visit here on our home page and kindly contact us for any of your queries regarding our products.

We are dedicated to offering the best customer service, excellent prices and fast deliveries. We spend quality time perfecting our offerings.

Thus our customers enjoy the benefits of our hard work.

Be Lovely In Leather!!!
